quoteText: You have the right to inquire as to whether TunnelBear is Processing Personal Data about you, request access to Personal Data, and ask that we correct, amend or delete your Personal Data where it is inaccurate.
title: You can request access and deletion of personal data

tosdr.case: You can request access and deletion of personal data
tosdr.tldr: TunnelBear defines "personal data" as "any information relating to an identified or identifiable natural person ("Individual") and includes information provided by you while using our Services". They also consider personal data combined with non-personal data to be personal data.  The privacy policy states that you can ask for them to correct, amend, or delete your personal data "where it is inaccurate". You can easily download, amend, or delete your personal data on https://www.tunnelbear.com/account/privacy.  A download of data can be emailed to you. You can update payment details and your email address yourself, but for all other data, you need to send an email to privacy@tunnelbear.com. Deleting all data involves deleting your account.
